name: Dice Mania (Iwonek101)
description:
Dice mania is a platformer you need to take ou enemies and pick up dices or other "powerUPs" when you find and pick up white dice click R to generate new level by rolling 2 dices. You also have red dices that you can roll by clicking E with them you can unlock doors. If you roll same amount as there is on a door you unlock it. 

Also There is probably lots of byg hehe, just restart the game and hope it won't happend again :)))

Oh and there is no sfx becuase mark said i need to hury because only 3 hours left 

even though this isn't some reallt good reaolutionary game i hope you still like some of it (:
